1.title: City Day/Let's Get to That Thing!
1.plot: City Day: Gluko and Lennon love Townopolis so much they make a commercial about it. The ad attracts huge crowds that clog the town, forcing them to make more ads to try to deter the visitors. Let's Get to That Thing: It's the last day to pet the softest animal at the petting zoo. The boys must get to the zoo before it closes, but keep running into friends who need their help.

2.title: Sorry Mr. Sun/What's the Trouble Bubble
2.plot: Sorry Mr. Sun: Lennon offends the sun, which causes a blackout in Townopolis. Both Gluko and Lennon must work on their apologies to save the town and soothe their consciences. What's the Trouble Bubble: Gluko and Lennon must get Little Bubble back home to Bubble Land, while making it back in time with Kitty Num Nums to stop a group of adorable, yet naughty kittens from messing up Grandma's house.

3.title: Bed Follows/Gotta Get a Gimmick
3.plot: Bed Follows: Gluko decides to avoid making his bed in favor of doing other fun things with Lennon. It's smooth sailing until Gluko's bed chases the boys to Freedomto - a town where everything is only halfway done. Gotta Get A Gimmick: When Gluko and Lennon meet a guy with a super sweet gimmick, they decide to adopt their own gimmicks in order to fit in with the cool crowd.

4.title: Space Kittens for Now/Blupo and Glendon
4.plot: Space Kittens for Now: After learning his fellow cats are aliens, Mr. Sprinkles decides to travel with them to their home planet. Gluko and Lennon try to get him to the kitten spaceship before blast off. Blupo and Glendon: Gluko and Lennon get into a fight and separate. Realizing they can't function without one another, they secretly take on new personas so they can continue hanging out.

5.title: Living the Dream/Oh No, Ho Cho Jo!
5.plot: Living the Dream: In a misguided attempt to do the right thing, Gluko and Lennon help Geremy follow his dreams. Oh No, Ho Cho Jo: Gluko and Lennon offer to watch Ho Cho Jo's shop while she runs an errand, but struggle with the pressure of keeping all customers happy.

6.title: Puppy Shower/Claude the Buff Hamster
6.plot: Puppy Shower: The citizens of Townopolis gather to observe the highly anticipated Centennial Puppy Shower. When the puppies don't show up, Gluko and Lennon join expert Penelop Pitt-Plebop to find the legendary puppies. Claude the Buff Hamster: After Gluko and Lennon make the world's heaviest pizza, they consult fitness guru Claude the Buff Hamster to get in shape so that they can lift a slice.

7.title: No Throwing Disc Left Behind / Happy Birthday, Here's a Goat!
7.plot: No Throwing Disc Left Behind: Gluko and Lennon are playing, when in through the window flies Sheena, stunt disc extraordinaire. She is attempting to break the World-Opolis record for longest throw. While trying to help, Gluko accidentally hucks her into the dark Uncharted Territories of Non-Central Park. Lennon is too scared to enter the territories, because of all the scary stories he's heard. In order to save Sheena, Gluko must take the lead. They enter the Uncharted Territories, which seem terrifying at first. When a group of dark objects bounce by, Lennon is ...

8.title: Snow Day / Rootin' for Change
8.plot: Snow Day: Gluko and Lennon offer to shovel Townopolis after a massive snowstorm, but are frozen solid before they can finish. They emerge from the ice in a future where high-waisted pants have taken over, and must find a way to go back in time to prevent the pants' oppressive reign. Rootin' for Change: While Gluko preps for his pickling license exam, Lennon struggles with a changing friend.

9.title: No Sleep til 8 O'clock / Gluko's Jelly Jam
9.plot: No Sleep til 8 O'clock: Lennon goes to bed while Gluko stays up watching his favorite TV show, Monkey Bid'ness. When Lennon wakes up, he sees Gluko still watching TV. He's a little upset since they had a big day planned, but lets Gluko nap for a little bit. Gluko naps so long Lennon gets tired and falls asleep. Gluko wakes up, and when he sees Lennon sleeping, decides to watch Monkey Bid'ness again. This goes on until eventually Lennon decides they need to get back on the same schedule so they can spend all their time together. They need to re-set Gluko's internal ...

10.title: Return of the Murple's / Lyle in Charge
10.plot: Return of the Murples: When Gluko and Lennon's annoying new neighbors turn out to be Lennon's rival from Mashball Camp, Lennon must confront his past and beat his old nemesis at a sport he swore he'd never play again. Lyle in Charge: Stuhven leaves after accusing Lennon of taking him for granted. Now Lennon must find a replacement who can learn how to navigate the labyrinth inside Lennon's hat.

11.title: The Great Tofu Drive / The Big Jump
11.plot: The Great Tofu Drive: Gluko, Lennon, Ho Cho Jo, and Frescha are charged with getting a herd of tofu blocks to pasture before a big storm hits. The Big Jump: Gluko teaches a reluctant Lennon how to cloud jump. Their fun is short lived as a mean dolphin named Big Nimbus mocks Lennon.

12.title: Cosmic Communications / A Bad Case of the Sherris
12.plot: Cosmic Communications: Gluko and Lennon try to help Mr. Sun and the Moon catch up in person by covering their shifts in the sky. Unable to handle being separated, Gluko and Lennon inadvertently unleash a wave of chaos. A Bad Case of the Sherris: Gluko and Lennon are quarantined inside due to an annoying sickness, and must find a way to get through the next 24 hours without losing their minds.

13.title: Friendiversary / Flower Power
13.plot: Friendiversary: On the occasion of their 300th Friendiversary, Gluko and Lennon recount how they first met. Flower Power: When Gluko and Lennon accidentally drive all the flowers out of town, they ask all of Townopolis to help bring them back.

imdb.plot outline: Two inseparable buddies, Gluko and Lennon, are in for a wonderfully strange adventure. Not only must they get a lost little bubble back home to Bubble Land, they need to make it back in time to stop a group of adorable yet naughty kittens from messing up Grandma's house.
imdb.title: Little Big Awesome
plot: Two inseparable buddies, Gluko and Lennon, are in for a wonderfully strange adventure. Not only must they get a lost little bubble back home to Bubble Land, they need to make it back in time to stop a group of adorable yet naughty kittens from messing up Grandma's house.
